attributes.action: Make Sex Education compulsary and change the way it is taught in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make Sex education compulsary for school children. Change the way it is taught so it start's at primary school and is consistent in the home (taught by parents and at school). The UK has one of, if not the highest teenage pregnancy rate. Unless the British government are prepared to be strong about this, nothing will change!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
